treatment.description: Primocanes slender, with scattered subulate prickles 2-4 mm. long; primocane-leaves 3-foliolate,velvety beneath; the leaflets oblong or oblong-lanceolate, merely acute, the terminal one 8-10 cm. long and 3-4 cm. broad; floricanes diffusely branched, their leaves similar to those of primocanes; corymbiform racemes few-flowered, nearly overtopped by the bracts; flowers 3 cm. broad.
